attributes.action: improve the SEARCH capability of the Downing St. e-petition website to include petition authors
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I found it difficult to find the petition I wanted to sign on this website. I searched on the author's name, but got no result. It would greatly improve the e-petition website if we sould find petitions of interest by searching for the author.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
